data.actual_result: It just "shuts down, as in closing the preview
data.expected_result: It should open a menu saying: "Restore - Move - Size - Minimize - Maximize - Close (Alt + F4)"
data.short_description: Rightclicking on "preview" of Discord on the Process Bar doesn't work
data.steps_to_repro: - Find Discord on the Process Bar - Hover your mouse of the Icon and a "preview" will pop up - Right Click the Preview - Observe
